notes: Very modern, clean unfurnished apartment with new fixtures, polished tile floors in living areas and wood flooring in bedroom. Balcony has proper vertical railings (baby-safe design). Excellent natural light with river views. Kitchen is brand new with modern cabinetry. Being on floor 12 of 15 in this type of building confirms elevator access. No visible safety concerns for a baby; the space is open and clean with no sharp corners.
